hack.title: Looking for someone with networking knowledge (packets)
hack.content: Hey! As you can assume I'm looking for someone with knowledge in networking. Specifically in some kind of MITM. So what I am trying to do is to modify a packet which is send from my client to the server. Although the communication is not really encrypted I somehow can't get it to work... UDP is used. Here is a snippet of the data (only the data) :Spoiler (Click to View)The data shows a transfer of a shovel from inventory A -> B.What I want to do is to modify that packet, so it would transfer 2 shovels even if I only have one. Or to do the transfer even if I have no shovel.If you have any idea how I could make this work or why it won't work, I would be very grateful to know.

gfx.title: Best site to create IG video story ads?
gfx.content: What are your suggestions? I googled and I found a lot of sites that offer that service, but so far I find only sites with a small number of templates.Do you have any suggestions? I don't want to use after effects or any other time consuming software. I want sites with easy templates that I can edit fast.

gfx.title: Looking for someone who can recreate a logo for my brand
gfx.content: So i recieved a logo for a project i was working on a while ago.and now i have reconcidered changing the logo and therefore i need someone who can help me create this logo in diferent sizes to be able to fit all kinds of merch.this should be a 5-10 minute job for the skilled GFX'er so let me know if you are interested in the details of the recreation by sending me a pm.and i'll explain further what needs to be done.

gfx.title: Can you help me sync GoPro and garageband outputs?
gfx.content: I want to use GoPro for video recording, and sync it with the music I am recording through garageband. The sound quality of GoPro is not so good. Has anyone done that before?
